items.name: Butter Chicken
items.desc: Boneless tandoori chicken cooked with rich tomato cream gravy

items.name: KungPao Chicken
items.desc: Spicy, sweet and incredibly delicious chicken with peanuts!

items.name: Jamaican Jerk Chicken
items.desc: A well-seasoned grilled chicken with a Jamaican jerk marinade that has the perfect balance of heat, sweet and savory.

items.name: Hawaiian Pizza
items.desc: a pizza topped with tomato sauce, cheese, pineapple, and bacon or ham

items.name: Japanese Sponge cake
items.desc: a cake with a light, airy texture that seems incongruous with its rich flavor

items.name: Lasagna
items.desc: Classic lasagna with ground beef, onion, Mozzarella, Ricotta, and Parmesan cheeses, tomato sauce and lasagna noodles

items.name: Apple Pie
items.desc: The Best Homemade Apple Pie With a flaky, buttery crust and filled with sliced apples, sugar, spices, and vanilla.

items.name: Mac and Cheese
items.desc: Macaroni and cheese, with tangy goat cheese, Cheddar, and Parmesan, along with a mixture of herbs.

items.name: Chow Mein
items.desc: A Chinese-style dish of steamed or stir-fried vegetables, topped with shredded chicken, shrimp, etc., and served with fried noodles.

items.name: Pumpkin Pie
items.desc: The best pumpkin pie with a tender, flaky crust and gently spiced pumpkin filling.

items.name: Swedish Meatball
items.desc: We have better meatballs than IKEA!

items.name: Samosa
items.desc: a triangular savory pastry fried in ghee or oil, containing spiced vegetables or meat.
